definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: (NH [[בְּכֵּר]], Aram. [[בַּכֵּר]], bakar; cf. Ar. bakara rise early, do anything early; bikrun, virgin, woman having her first child; Eth. bakur: primogenitus; As. bukru, first-born, Dl:§ 65, 5)—
bear early, new fruit Ez Eze 47:12.
make or constitute as first-born De 21:16 (den. of [[בכיר]]).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יְבֻכַּר]] Le 27:26 born or made a firstling.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pt. f. [[מַבְכִּירָה]] Je 4:31 one bearing her first child.
